# Variable Creation

```{r}
data <- read.csv("CENT_s1_s2_shows.csv") %>% select(-X)
C3_s1_clusters <- read.csv("C3_raw_s1_5kmeans_clusters.csv") %>% 
  select(-X.1) %>% rename(C3_s1_cluster = cluster_kmeans_5)
LS_s1_clusters <- read.csv("LS_raw_s1_3dtw_clusters.csv") %>% 
  select(-X.1) %>% rename(LS_s1_cluster = cluster_dtw_3)
```

```{r}
USA <- data %>% filter(Network == "USA")
other_networks <- data %>% filter(Network != "USA")

USA$Date <- as.Date(USA$Date, format = "%m/%d/%Y")
other_networks$Date <- as.Date(other_networks$Date)

data <- rbind(USA, other_networks) %>% 
  arrange(Show_Name, Season_num, Episode_num)
```

```{r}
data$Start_Time <- as.POSIXlt(round(as.double(strptime(as.character(data$Start_Time), 
                                                              "%H:%M:%S"))/(30*60))*(30*60), 
                                     origin = (as.POSIXlt('1970-01-01')))

data$End_Time <- as.POSIXlt(round(as.double(strptime(as.character(data$End_Time), 
                                                            "%H:%M:%S"))/(30*60))*(30*60), 
                                   origin = (as.POSIXlt('1970-01-01')))

data$program_duration <- data$End_Time - data$Start_Time

data$program_duration[data$program_duration == -1410] <- 30
data$program_duration[data$program_duration == -1380] <- 60
data$program_duration[data$program_duration == -1320] <- 120

data$Start_Time <- format(data$Start_Time, "%H:%M")
data$End_Time <- format(data$End_Time, "%H:%M")
```

```{r}
data$diff_C3_LS <- data$C3_Impressions - data$LS_Impressions
data$higher_imps <- ifelse(data$C3_Impressions > data$LS_Impressions, "C3", "LS")
```

```{r}
data$avg_C3_LS <- (data$C3_Impressions + data$LS_Impressions) / 2
```

```{r}
data <- data %>% group_by(Show_Name) %>% 
  mutate(cum_ep = row_number())
```

```{r}
correlations <- data %>% 
  group_by(Show_Name, Season_num) %>% 
  summarise(correlation = cor(C3_Impressions, LS_Impressions, method = "pearson"))
```

```{r}
season_averages <- data %>% 
  group_by(Show_Name, Season_num) %>% 
  summarise(avg_C3 = mean(C3_Impressions), 
            avg_LS = mean(LS_Impressions))
```

```{r}
stats_by_season <- merge(season_averages, correlations)

stats_by_season$higher_imps <- ifelse(stats_by_season$avg_C3 > stats_by_season$avg_LS, "C3", "LS")
```

```{r}
data <- data %>% 
  group_by(Show_Name) %>% 
  mutate(unique_DOWs_total = length(unique(DOW)), 
         unique_starts_total = length(unique(Start_Time)))

data <- data %>% 
  group_by(Show_Name, Season_num) %>% 
  mutate(unique_DOWs_season = length(unique(DOW)), 
         unique_starts_season = length(unique(Start_Time)))
```

```{r}
no_changes_total <- data %>% 
  filter(unique_DOWs_total == 1 & unique_starts_total == 1)

no_changes_season <- data %>% 
  filter(unique_DOWs_season == 1 & unique_starts_season == 1)

shows_with_changes <- data %>% 
  filter(unique_DOWs_season != 1 & unique_starts_season != 1)
```

```{r}
season_changes <- data %>% group_by(Show_Name, Season_num) %>% 
  summarise(unique_DOWs_total = mean(unique_DOWs_total), 
            unique_starts_total = mean(unique_starts_total), 
            unique_DOWs_season = mean(unique_DOWs_season), 
            unique_starts_season = mean(unique_starts_season))

stats_by_season <- merge(stats_by_season, season_changes)
```

```{r}
C3_s1_clusters <- as.data.frame(unique(C3_s1_clusters[1:2]))
LS_s1_clusters <- as.data.frame(unique(LS_s1_clusters[1:2]))

s1_clusters <- merge(C3_s1_clusters, LS_s1_clusters)
```

```{r}
data <- data %>% 
  mutate(change_DOW_overall = ifelse(unique_DOWs_total == 1, "No", "Yes"), 
         change_start_overall = ifelse(unique_starts_total == 1, "No", "Yes"), 
         change_DOW_season = ifelse(unique_DOWs_season == 1, "No", "Yes"), 
         change_start_season = ifelse(unique_starts_season == 1, "No", "Yes"))

stats_by_season <- stats_by_season %>% 
  mutate(change_DOW_overall = ifelse(unique_DOWs_total == 1, "No", "Yes"), 
         change_start_overall = ifelse(unique_starts_total == 1, "No", "Yes"), 
         change_DOW_season = ifelse(unique_DOWs_season == 1, "No", "Yes"), 
         change_start_season = ifelse(unique_starts_season == 1, "No", "Yes"))
```

```{r}
data <- merge(data, s1_clusters)
write.csv(data, "s1_s2_data.csv")

stats_by_season <- merge(stats_by_season, s1_clusters)
write.csv(stats_by_season, "s1_s2_stats_by_season.csv")
```

s1_C3_clusters <- data %>%

  group_by(LS_s1_cluster) %>%

            unique_start = length(unique(Start_Time)), 
            unique_network = length(unique(Network)), 
            unique_broadcast_year = length(unique(Broadcast_Year)), 
            unique_genre = length(unique(Genre)),

data %>% filter(Season_num == 1) %>%

```{r}
comp_imps <- function(show)
{
  season2 <- data %>% filter(Show_Name == show, Season_num == 2)
   data %>% 
    filter(Show_Name == show) %>% 
    plot_ly(x = ~cum_ep) %>%  
    add_trace(y = ~C3_Impressions, type = "scatter", mode = "line+markers", 
              color = "C3", line = list(color = "#31a354")) %>%
    add_trace(y = ~LS_Impressions, type = "scatter", mode = "line+markers", 
              color = "LS", line = list(color = "#3182bd")) %>%
    layout(title = paste("C3 vs LS Impressions for", show),
           yaxis = list(title = ""), 
           xaxis = list(title = "Episode"),
           margin = list(l = 80, 
                         r = 0, 
                         b = 50, 
                         t = 50), 
           shapes = list(type = "line", 
                         x0 = ~min(season2$cum_ep), 
                         x1 = ~min(season2$cum_ep), 
                         xref = "x",
                         y0 = 0, 
                         y1 = 1,
                         yref = "paper",
                         line = list(dash = 'dot', width = 1)), 
           annotations = list(text = "Season 2",
                              font = list(family = "Arial", 
                                          color = "grey"),
                              x = ~min(season2$cum_ep),
                              xref = "x",
                              xanchor = "right",
                              y = 1,
                              yref = "paper",
                              textangle = 270,
                              showarrow = FALSE))
}

comp_imps_s1 <- function(show)
{
  season1 %>% 
    filter(Show_Name == show) %>% 
    plot_ly(x = ~cum_ep) %>%  
    add_trace(y = ~C3_Impressions, type = "scatter", mode = "line+markers", 
              color = "C3", line = list(color = "#31a354")) %>%
    add_trace(y = ~LS_Impressions, type = "scatter", mode = "line+markers", 
              color = "LS", line = list(color = "#3182bd")) %>%
    layout(title = paste("C3 vs LS Impressions for", show),
           yaxis = list(title = ""), 
           xaxis = list(title = "Episode"),
           margin = list(l = 80, 
                         r = 0, 
                         b = 50, 
                         t = 50))
}
```
